class ImagePaddle extends Paddle
This class contains the model for the image paddle.

  • Constructor Details

    • ImagePaddle

      public ImagePaddle(javafx.geometry.Point2D ballPoint, int width, int height, javafx.scene.shape.Rectangle container, javafx.scene.image.Image image, javafx.scene.Group group)
      This constructor creates the regular paddle type, whose viewing is expected to be a rectangle with an image attaches to it.
      Parameters:
      ballPoint - paddle's start point
      width - defined paddle width
      height - defined paddle height
      container - defined paddle movement range
      image - expected paddle image
      group - expected viewing group
